name: Get Set Games
overview:
Get Set Games is an indie game developer based in Toronto, Canada.

Makers of Mega Jump, Poptweets and Addicus for the iPhone and iPod Touch.

Makers of Addicus HD and Poptweets HD for the iPad.

milestones.description: Released Addicus for the iPhone and iPod Touch
milestones.source_description: Addicus Available on the App Store!

milestones.description: Released Poptweets for the iPhone and iPod Touch
milestones.source_description: Poptweets is Now Available on the iPhone App Store â€“ Free!

milestones.description: Launched Poptweets.net, the companion site for Poptweets iPhone game
milestones.source_description: Just Launched Poptweets.net, the Companion Site to the Poptweets iPhone Game

milestones.description: Released Addicus HD and Poptweets HD for the iPad
milestones.source_description: Addicus HD and Poptweets HD Now Available for iPad

milestones.description: Release Mega Jump for the iPhone and iPod Touch
milestones.source_description: Mega Jump is Now Available for iPhone and iPod Touch â€“ Start Jumping!

milestones.description: Mega Jump Downloaded Over 10 Million Times
Get Set Games Picked as Top 50 Developer by Pocket Gamer
